title: BuildSync
description: A comprehensive project management platform for builders and clients. Features 3D model visualization with dynamic weather effects, real-time project tracking, financial management for pending payments, linked 2D floor plans, and a client portal. Clients can view apartment details, manage notes visible to builders, access project documents, and track deal agreements.

title: Vita - Todo List
description: A modern, responsive task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, deadline tracking, and priority levels. Features a beautiful glassmorphism UI with real-time task updates and completion tracking.

title: Emergency Room Triaging Simulation
description: A web-based simulation using Python and Mesa to model an emergency room, where a doctor navigates a 2D field to triage patients based on health conditions and proximity. Features dynamic health decrease, curing logic, and an interactive front-end with real-time efficiency graphs.

title: Music Emotion Detection Platform
description: An AI-powered platform to detect emotions in audio files with 90% accuracy. Built with Flask for audio processing and Charts.js for visualizing detected emotions, enhancing user data interpretation.

title: Django Feedback Portal
description: A feedback portal built with Django and MySQL, improving data navigation and processing efficiency by 20%. Features secure data handling and a user-friendly interface.

title: OOP Game Demo
description: A game demonstrating Object-Oriented Programming principles, built with Python. Showcases inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation in an interactive format.

title: SilverHub Jewellery Store
description: A React-based e-commerce website for SilverHub, a jewellery store in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. Features a responsive design showcasing gold, silver, and diamond jewellery with product browsing and contact details.

title: Visited Countries Tracker
description: A web application to track visited places on an interactive map, allowing users to mark and visualize locations across different countries.

title: Dynamic User Interface
description: A dynamic login interface built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring responsive design and interactive elements for user authentication.

title: ShopCart
description: A Python-based application using Tkinter to simulate a shopping cart. Users can add/remove products, track quantities, and manage stock with a simple GUI.

title: Sequence Game
description: A web-based implementation of the Sequence board game, where players mark cards on a board with chips. Features an interactive interface for gameplay.
